name: T-Nu Invaders
description:
This "game"  is a little Collaboration with T-Nu, from Cajun Craftastrophe.   His latest video is about crafting resin space invaders, so we conjured this up to go along with it. He sent us some audio, graphics (the invaders and other characters are scans of his resin creations) , and some videos.

Setting:

T-Nu is sitting at his computer about to play some video games.  Daddy is looking over his shoulder. You control the player using the arrow keys and the space bar shoots.

The game itself  IS playable, but its more about the 'back-and-forth" between father and son. It's worth "beating the game" and also losing, to hear the dialog.  

If you haven't heard of T-Nu or his channel, PLEASE check it out, its great!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkoIXAz16GztHi1kbGzm6Cw

The game is about 30 MB. Game length is about 5 minutes.  Installs into the Program Files folder. Tosses a desktop shortcut on the desktop. Comes with an uninstaller.

Because it is a "new" file, (not downloaded often) Windows and/or your browser may freak out a little. 

Hope you enjoy it.

*pew pew pew*
